caption: Figure 3: Comparison of JudgeBench against prior benchmarks for LLM-based judges.
description: The chart compares the performance of several LLMs on JudgeBench and other existing benchmarks for evaluating LLM-based judges.
section: 4.3 COMPARING JUDGEBENCH TO OTHER EXISTING BENCHMARKS

caption: Figure 4: Comparing JudgeBench's evaluation results on GPT-40 versus Claude-3.5-Sonnet generated pairs.
description: The chart compares the performance of various LLMs on JudgeBench using response pairs generated by either GPT-40 or Claude-3.5-Sonnet.
